title: Every single patch is hell
body: Help me to fix this,none want to fix this, i am tired of new patches , I  am stuck in scanning files for 6 hours,tired of this already, i better uninstall LOL than update another patch.

replies.body: I dont close patcher when its updating , and dont using any toher programs but it still does the same thing

The length of time it takes to finish patching can depend on your PC.  As long as you aren't having any errors, your best bet is to wait this out and let it complete.  Selecting to close it mid-update can cause the patcher to scan for corrupt files, which can take even longer.  Hang tight!
